  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600

    LayoutNGBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutNGBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x240
        LayoutNGBlockFlow (floating) {DIV} at (0,0) size 200x200
        LayoutNGBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 200x200 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
        LayoutNGBlockFlow (anonymous) at (0,200) size 784x40
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 724x39
            text run at (0,0) width 724: "This text should be underneath a 200x200 lime float. We are making sure that the code that wraps inline children in"
            text run at (0,20) width 608: "anonymous blocks does the right thing when blocks are inserted in between a float and an inline."
